docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: 官方文档
docs.text:
本地地址: 127.0.0.1:8000.

官网地址: mkdocs.org.

使用手册: mkdocs.org/getting-started.

第三方主题: MkDocs-Themes.

docs.title: 指令
docs.text:
• 安装: pip install mkdocs
  • mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: 工程结构
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: 主题
docs.text:
• 官方: https://www.mkdocs.org/user-guide/configuration/#theme
  • 官方: https://www.mkdocs.org/user-guide/choosing-your-theme/
  • 第三方安装: pip install mkdocs-material
